package.name: CamScripts
package.description: desc just say what it does ...NOT say FC

library.name: CamLibTbAdd
library.description: Library to create & add one or many ToolBits to current Library.

library.name: CamScripting
library.description: Library to automate all CAM steps to create a Job, Operations, ToolControllers, Sanity report postprocessed gcode and calculate Spindle RPM from Tool and Stock material properties. Many key properties are set to provide realistic FreeCAD Job and gcode.

library.name: JobUtils
library.description: Path workbench utility functions to aid in job and tool controller scripting.

macro.name: CamLibTbAddExample
macro.description: Example code to use CamLibTbAdd library to create & add one or many ToolBits to current Library.

macro.name: CamFullProcessExample
macro.description: All CAM steps to create a Job, Operations, ToolControllers, Sanity report postprocessed gcode and calculate Spindle RPM from Tool and Stock material properties.
macro.tag: CAM, All, Job, Operations, Library, ToolControllers, ToolBits, Materials, Calculate, Speeds, Feeds, Sanity, Report, Gcode
